divs: Sighting DetailsWalked outside to take Dog to do it's business. I looked down the Alsea River towards Ocean and I noticed a very,very bright light in the sky.It was not moving. I watched it for about 5 minutes I thought it might be a Coast Guard helicopter but it was'nt moving.I woke up my Daughter to come outside.I told her put a coat because it was very cold that night. She saw the light also, she watched it for about 3 minutes, and Holy **** it's a UFO. After she went inside I stayed outside about 2 more minutes, I went back inside to call my Husband. That is when i realized it had moved because I could no longer see it from under my deck. We walked out to the middle of the drive way my Husband and I watched it.While we were watching it I thought I saw it move towards the right but my Husband said no it did not move. He went back inside and I stayed outside still watching it. The light was losing its brightness. It looked light it was fading.
trends: There have been 4 other sightings in Yachats
There were no other sightings in Yachats on or around June 17th 2010
Summary: Cold, clear night west of Waldport, Oregon looked like over the bay.
